title: cant update me game (unspecified error)
body: I cant update my game because of some unspecified error bs.... this is the first time its happened.. what should i do.. is anybody else having the same problameo?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try downloading the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) for me, launch it as Administrator and select the "Force Repatch" option.

Let me know if this helps.
it didnt help. still the same error
when i right click the icon there is no 'run as administrator'
how can i launch it as admin?
